summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use; amending Chapters 23.47, Commercial zones; 23.48, Seattle Mixed zone; 23.49, Downtown zones; 23.50, Industrial zones; 23.54, Parking and Access; 23.55, Signs; 23.66, Special Review Districts; and 23.84, Definitions; of the Seattle Municipal Code, specifying a definition and permitted locations and development standards for adult cabarets.
